Summary Note:
Joris Jacobs De Smet and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Brussels. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Joris Jacobs De Smet is a 69 year old retired Fund Manager from Belgium.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: Joris Jacobs De Smet is married to Gabriella. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1973, Joris graduated from Koninklijk Atheneum Gent with a secondary school diploma.
Joris received his degree from ICHEC Brussels Management School in 1980.
Occupation History:
Joris Jacobs De Smet is a 69 year old retired Fund Manager from Belgium.
Joris Jacobs De Smet launched his career as a Analyst at PMV NV, where he gained valuable experience from 1979 to 1984.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Associate at Sofina SA in 1986, further expanding his skill set.
His tenure as a Investment Director at Sofina SA from 1990 to 1991 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
His next role was as a Partner at Sofina SA, where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 1993 to 1995.
Joris Jacobs De Smet retired after holding the position of Fund Manager at Verlinvest SA from 1996 to 2016.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 1820000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Client does not have any properties.He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Joris as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
